title: Conversions of foreign money in a distribution proceeding
context: [ยง658B-8] Conversions of foreign money in a distribution proceeding. The rate of exchange prevailing at or near the closing of business on the day the proceeding is initiated shall govern all exchanges of foreign money in a distribution proceeding. A foreign-money claimant in a distribution proceeding must assert its claim in the named foreign money and show the amount of United States dollars resulting from a conversion as of the date the proceeding was initiated. [L 1990, c 50, pt of ยง1]
